de.undercouch.citeproc.helper.oauth

Class OAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.undercouch.citeproc.helper.oauth.OAuth

  • public class OAuth
extends Object
    Performs OAuth authentication. Very minimal implementation, only used for Mendeley authentication currently.
    Author:
    Michel Kraemer

    • Field Detail

      • CALLBACK_OOB

        public static final String CALLBACK_OOB
        Out-of-band callback. Use this if you don't want to provide a callback URL to the OAuth server
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • OAuth

        public OAuth(String consumerKey,
     String consumerSecret)
        Creates a new OAuth client
        Parameters:
        consumerKey - the consumer key
        consumerSecret - the consumer secret

    • Method Detail

      • requestTemporaryCredentials

        public Token requestTemporaryCredentials(URL url,
                                OAuth.Method method,
                                String callback)
                                  throws IOException
        Requests temporary credentials. This is the first step in the OAuth authentication process. The temporary credentials are used to generate an authorization URL.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL from which the temporary credentials should be requested
        method - the HTTP request method
        callback - a callback URL used during authorization (or CALLBACK_OOB if the client is unable to receive callbacks)
        Returns:
        the temporary credentials
        Throws:
        IOException - if the request was not successful
        RequestException - if the server returned an error
        UnauthorizedException - if the request is not authorized

      • requestTokenCredentials

        public Token requestTokenCredentials(URL url,
                            OAuth.Method method,
                            Token temporaryCredentials,
                            String verifier)
                              throws IOException
        Requests token credentials. This is the third step in the OAuth authentication process after the user has authenticated the app using the authorization URL and the temporary credentials created with requestTemporaryCredentials(URL, Method, String)
        Parameters:
        url - the URL from which the token credentials should be requested
        method - the HTTP request method
        temporaryCredentials - the temporary credentials
        verifier - the verification code returned by the OAuth server
        Returns:
        the token credentials
        Throws:
        IOException - if the request was not successful
        RequestException - if the server returned an error
        UnauthorizedException - if the request is not authorized

      • request

        public InputStream request(URL url,
                  OAuth.Method method,
                  Token token)
                    throws IOException
        Sends a request to the server and returns an input stream from which the response can be read. The caller is responsible for consuming the input stream's content and for closing the stream.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to send the request to
        method - the HTTP request method
        token - a token used for authorization (may be null if the authorization is not required for this request)
        Returns:
        the input stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if the request was not successful
        RequestException - if the server returned an error
        UnauthorizedException - if the request is not authorized
